testcase.name: Create a new user with valid data
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def createUserBody = read('classpath:Karate/user/createUserBody.json') .. passed * def createUserResponse = read('Karate/user/createUserResponse.json') .... passed Given path 'user' ......................................................... passed And request createUserBody ................................................ passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == createUserResponse .................................. passed And assert response.message == idUser ..................................... passed

testcase.name: Create a new user with valid status
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def createUserBody = read('classpath:Karate/user/createUserBody.json') .. passed * def createUserResponse = read('Karate/user/createUserResponse.json') .... passed Given path 'user' ......................................................... passed And request createUserBody ................................................ passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == createUserResponse .................................. passed And assert response.message == idUser ..................................... passed * url url ................................................................. passed * def createUserBody = read('classpath:Karate/user/createUserBody.json') .. passed Given path 'user' ......................................................... passed And request createUserBody ................................................ passed And createUserBody.userStatus = "Available" ............................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 500 ........................................................... passed

testcase.name: Create a new user with valid status
